definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to eat bear heart and leopard gall (idiom)/to pluck up some courage
pinyin: chi1 xiong2 xin1 bao4 zi5 dan3

sentences.english: Uncle Vernon suddenly found his voice.
sentences.chinese: 這時弗農姨父好像突然吃了豹子膽。

sentences.english: Whether leopards have feathers or not, it's hens that always end up in a pot.
sentences.chinese: 不管豹子有沒有羽毛，被煮的總是老母雞。

sentences.english: LiBiao resolution with SanYing privately turned to kill leopards ditch LinZhenHai.
sentences.chinese: 李彪決議帶着三營私自轉到豹子溝殺掉林振海。

sentences.english: The leopard slid along the sides of the cage toward their pedestals.
sentences.chinese: 豹子輕快地沿着獸籠的邊緣走向坐架。

sentences.english: A single cat finds it tricky to bring down a full-grown wildebeest.
sentences.chinese: 一隻豹子會發現自己很難撲倒一隻成年角馬。

sentences.english: It was in David and Peda's house that I met leopard Jaby.
sentences.chinese: 我就是在戴維和佩達家見到豹子傑比的。

sentences.english: Full of strange oaths and bearded like the pard .
sentences.chinese: 滿口奇怪的誓言，鬍鬚留得像豹子。

sentences.english: Each Panther caught fire, and all the crews who escaped were badly burned.
sentences.chinese: 每輛豹子都中彈起火，逃出來的裝甲兵全被嚴重燒傷。

sentences.english: Anna used fire balls to burn it's neck. The leopard was quickly burned by the fire and turned into ash.
sentences.chinese: 安娜用火球燒斷豹子的脖子，豹子就被慢慢化爲灰燼。

sentences.english: Anna used fire balls to burn it's neck. The leopard was quickly burned by the fire and turned into ash.
sentences.chinese: 安娜用火球燒斷豹子的脖子，豹子就被慢慢化爲灰燼。

sentences.english: Full of strange oaths, and bearded like the pard.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的誓言不絕於口，鬍鬚如同豹子的觸鬚。

sentences.english: The whole area will remain cordoned off until the escaped leopards recaptured.
sentences.chinese: 整個地區將一直封鎖到逃脫的豹子被重新被抓獲。
